attributes.action: Make it an offence to enter a roundabout unless your exit is clear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When there is traffic congestion that stretches either side of a roundabout, drivers block the roundabout without regard for other motorists who wish to take a different path through the roundabout. It should be made an offence to do this on all roundabouts except those at major junctions where progress is managed bt traffic signals.
